Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to method of collection of charges by the town of Wilton water and sewer authority
Summary: Authorizes the town of Wilton water and sewer authority to collect unpaid water bills through tax collections.
LawCode: Add ยง1125-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to method of collection of charges by the town of Wilton water and sewer authority
